vlive.korean: '이 한심한 놈'하면서 보고 있는 거예요. Looking at it thinking, 'What a pitiful guy'. 듣기 View video iKON : iKON - '죽겠다(KILLING ME)' M/V MAKING FILM

vlive.korean: [저 한심한 녀석] 카메라마저 뺏긴 거야? [That doofus] Did they take the camera away too? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 선공개 02. 그것이 알고싶다! 박항서 감독 과거 털기

vlive.korean: 니가 말은 안했지만 나를 얼마나 한심한 놈으로 봤겠어. You didn't say anything but you thought of me as pathetic. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 연플리 시즌 2 - 7회
vlive.english: You didn't say anything but you thought of me as pathetic.

vlive.korean: 네. 참 한심한... Yes. Very stupid... 듣기 View video LEE MIN HO : [Replay]이민호의 앞터V(LEE MIN HO's Early Interview)
